name: judicially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves a law court: He failed to have his name judicially cleared. These problems should be dealt with administratively rather than judicially. See
judicial
More examplesFewer examplesHe was judicially separated from his wife and she lived in their house.She was judicially ordered to submit to a psychiatric evaluation.He is a judicially recognized officer of the court.
